comment.author: 23224989@N07
comment._content: Strange sense of deja vu, seeing this picture.  Like someplace from a dream.  I wonder if any of these people are still dead.

comment.author: 28382104@N00
comment._content: Hi, I'm an admin for a group called billboards, and we'd love to have this added to the group!

comment.author: 51035826751@N01
comment._content: i agree with geekem, the view is facing east, looks like those houses are still there in fact, compare the roofs.

comment.author: 24929333@N02
comment._content: I look at this photo and it reminds me of OUR TOWN where the actors sit there portraying the dead-- here is seems like the deceased are sitting there watching life go by.  "Hey Bert, isn't that Ralph Jones driving this way? I always thought he drove Plymouths."
